forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Chance Rain And Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 4am, then a chance of rain and snow showers. Mostly cloudy. Low around 34, with temperatures rising to around 36 overnight. Northwest wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
